docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The combination of crack, the AIDS virus and a sharp rise in the syphilis rate is leading experts to fear that AIDS is increasingly spreading in the nation's poorest neighborhoods through heterosexual contact, as it has in the epidemic in Africa.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The drug AZT can delay the onset of AIDS in people who are infected with the virus but have no symptoms, the Government announced yesterday.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In an effort to control rising Medicaid costs, New York State plans this fall to set annual limits on doctor and laboratory visits and prescriptions for its 2.3 million Medicaid recipients.
